# Rejuvenate Eidolon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a drop of your blood)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Eidolon touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 238

This spell functions as *[[Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser (Spell)|lesser rejuvenate eidolon]]*, except that it cures 3d10 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +10).
